mapper.select:
select dataGranularityFirst, orderFirst, dataGranularitySecond, orderSecond, dataGranularityThird, orderThird, siteNum, stockSiteNum, stockSiteRate, stockScoringThreshold, stockPassAuditSiteNum, notVertNewStockSiteNum, notVertNewStockSpeGuaSiteNum, notVertNewStockScoringThreshold, notVertNewStockPassAuditSiteNum, notVertNewStockSpeGuaAndPassAuditSiteNum, notVertNewNewSiteNum, notVertNewNewSpeGuaSiteNum, notVertNewNewScoringThreshold, notVertNewNewPassAuditSiteNum, notVertNewNewSpeGuaAndPassAuditSiteNum, vertNewStockSiteNum, vertNewStockSpeGuaSiteNum, vertNewStockScoringThreshold, vertNewStockPassAuditSiteNum, vertNewStockSpeGuaAndPassAuditSiteNum, vertNewNewSiteNum, vertNewNewSpeGuaSiteNum, vertNewNewScoringThreshold, vertNewNewPassAuditSiteNum, vertNewNewSpeGuaAndPassAuditSiteNum, passAuditRatio from ( select '全国' as dataGranularityFirst, concat('1', '') as orderFirst, '' as dataGranularitySecond, '' as orderSecond, '' as dataGranularityThird, '' as orderThird, groupUniqArray(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10'), scoring_threshold, null)) as notVertNewStockScoringThresholdArray, groupUniqArray(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10'), scoring_threshold, null)) as vertNewStockScoringThresholdArray, groupUniqArray(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11'), scoring_threshold, null)) as notVertNewNewScoringThresholdArray, groupUniqArray(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11'), scoring_threshold, null)) as vertNewNewScoringThresholdArray, groupUniqArray(if(built_state == '9', scoring_threshold, null)) as stockScoringThresholdArray, ifNull(sum(bs_num_5g), 0) as siteNum, sum(if(built_state == '9', bs_num_5g, 0)) as stockSiteNum, intDivOrZero(toDecimal64(stockSiteNum, 2) * 100, toDecimal64(siteNum, 2)) as stockSiteRate, if(or(length(stockScoringThresholdArray) > 1, length(stockScoringThresholdArray) = 0), null,stockScoringThresholdArray[1]) as stockScoringThreshold, sum(if(and(built_state == '9', is_high_value_by_score == '1'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as stockPassAuditSiteNum, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewStockSiteNum, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10', spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewStockSpeGuaSiteNum, if(or(length(notVertNewStockScoringThresholdArray) > 1, length(notVertNewStockScoringThresholdArray) = 0), null,notVertNewStockScoringThresholdArray[1]) as notVertNewStockScoringThreshold, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10',is_high_value_by_score == '1'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewStockPassAuditSiteNum, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10',is_high_value_by_score == '1', spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewStockSpeGuaAndPassAuditSiteNum, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewNewSiteNum, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11',spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewNewSpeGuaSiteNum, if(or(length(notVertNewNewScoringThresholdArray) > 1, length(notVertNewNewScoringThresholdArray) = 0), null,notVertNewNewScoringThresholdArray[1]) as notVertNewNewScoringThreshold, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11',is_high_value_by_score == '1'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewNewPassAuditSiteNum, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11',is_high_value_by_score == '1', spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewNewSpeGuaAndPassAuditSiteNum, sum(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as vertNewStockSiteNum, sum(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10',spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as vertNewStockSpeGuaSiteNum, if(or(length(vertNewStockScoringThresholdArray) > 1, length(vertNewStockScoringThresholdArray) = 0), null,vertNewStockScoringThresholdArray[1]) as vertNewStockScoringThreshold, sum(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10',is_high_value_by_score == '1'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as vertNewStockPassAuditSiteNum, sum(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10',is_high_value_by_score == '1', spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as vertNewStockSpeGuaAndPassAuditSiteNum, sum(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as vertNewNewSiteNum, sum(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11',spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as vertNewNewSpeGuaSiteNum, if(or(length(vertNewNewScoringThresholdArray) > 1, length(vertNewNewScoringThresholdArray) = 0), null,vertNewNewScoringThresholdArray[1]) as vertNewNewScoringThreshold, sum(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as vertNewNewSpeGuaAndPassAuditSiteNum, intDivOrZero(toDecimal64(sum(if(is_high_value_by_score == '1', bs_num_5g, 0)), 2) * 100,toDecimal64(siteNum, 2)) as passAuditRatio from cmdi_pvopp.ads_indoor_weighted_score_for_annual_plan_info where event_id = #{params.raw.id} having siteNum > 0 union all select '全国' as dataGranularityFirst, concat('1', '') as scoring_threshold, null)) as stockScoringThresholdArray, ifNull(sum(bs_num_5g), 0) as siteNum, sum(if(built_state == '9', bs_num_5g, 0)) as stockSiteNum, intDivOrZero(toDecimal64(stockSiteNum, 2) * 100, toDecimal64(siteNum, 2)) as stockSiteRate, if(or(length(stockScoringThresholdArray) > 1, length(stockScoringThresholdArray) = 0), null,stockScoringThresholdArray[1]) as stockScoringThreshold, sum(if(and(built_state == '9', is_high_value_by_score == '1'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as stockPassAuditSiteNum, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewStockSiteNum, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10', spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewStockSpeGuaSiteNum, and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewNewSiteNum, sum(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11',spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as notVertNewNewSpeGuaSiteNum, if(or(length(notVertNewNewScoringThresholdArray) > 1, length(notVertNewNewScoringThresholdArray) = 0), '10',is_high_value_by_score == '1'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as vertNewStockPassAuditSiteNum, sum(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '10',is_high_value_by_score == '1', spe_gua <> ''), bs_num_5g, 0)) as vertNewStockSpeGuaAndPassAuditSiteNum, sum(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), built_state == '11'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as vertNewNewSiteNum, passAuditRatio from cmdi_pvopp.ads_indoor_weighted_score_for_annual_plan_info where event_id = #{params.raw.id} group by province_type,
province_name citys_name province_name citys_name
union all select province_type as dataGranularityFirst, concat('2', multiIf( province_type = '一类', '1', province_type = '二类', '2', province_type = '三类', '3', province_type = '四类', '4', province_type = '五类', '5', province_type = '六类', '6', '7')) as orderFirst,
province_name citys_name province_name citys_name as dataGranularitySecond,
concat('2', any(toString(province_order))) concat('2', any(toString(citys_order))) concat('2', any(toString(province_order))) concat('2', any(toString(citys_order))) as orderSecond,
area_type area_type building_site_secondary_cover_scene building_site_secondary_cover_scene as dataGranularityThird,

length(stockScoringThresholdArray) = 0), null,stockScoringThresholdArray[1]) as stockScoringThreshold, sum(if(and(built_state == '9', is_high_value_by_score == '1'), bs_num_5g, 0)) as if(or(length(notVertNewNewScoringThresholdArray) > 1, length(notVertNewNewScoringThresholdArray) = 0), null,notVertNewNewScoringThresholdArray[1]) as notVertNewNewScoringThreshold, sum(if(and(not cmdi_pvopp.ads_indoor_weighted_score_for_annual_plan_info where event_id = #{params.raw.id} group by province_type,
